page.title: 06Family Life In Hoo.
page.content:
"Early Saturday morning I get dressed, go round to the garage get my BMX out and go to the shop to do my paper round. Then I go home,put my bike in the garage,go indoors,take my coat off,let my dog out and make some breakfast.By this time,the rest of my family is down.After breakfast my dad reads the newspapers in the lounge,and then does something to the car or caravan.My mum works in the garden or in the house while my brother and sister play all day.Sunday is much the same as Saturday apart from the special roast dinner."
Written by Jason Cox. Age 14.
